disorders.name: Aichmophobia
disorders.survivor_effect: You cannot activate or depart with axes, swords, spears, daggers, scythes, or katars in your gear grid.

disorders.name: Anxiety
disorders.survivor_effect: At the start of each showdown, gain the priority target token unless you have stinky gear in your gear grid.

disorders.name: Apathetic
disorders.survivor_effect: You cannot use or gain survival. You cannot gain courage. Cure this disorder if you have 8+ understanding.

disorders.name: Binge Eating
disorders.survivor_effect: You cannot depart unless you have consumable gear in your gear grid. You must consume if a choice to consume arises.

disorders.name: Coprolalia
disorders.survivor_effect: All your gear is noisy. You are always a threat unless you are knocked down, even if an effect says otherwise.

disorders.name: Fear of the Dark
disorders.survivor_effect:
You retire.
If you gain this disorder during a hunt or showdown, you put on a brave face until you return to the settlement, vowing never to leave the Lantern Hoard again.

disorders.name: Hemophobia
disorders.survivor_effect: During the showdown, whenever a survivor (including you) gains a bleeding token, you are knocked down.

disorders.name: Hoarder
disorders.survivor_effect: Whenever you are a returning survivor, archive 1 resource gained from the last showdown and gain +1 courage.

disorders.name: Honorable
disorders.survivor_effect: You cannot attack a monster from its blind spot or if it is knocked down.

disorders.name: Hyperactive
disorders.survivor_effect: During the showdown, you must move at least 1 space every round.

disorders.name: Immortal
disorders.survivor_effect:
While you are insane, convert all damage dealt to your hit locations to brain damage.
You are so busy reveling in your own glory that you cannot spend survival while insane.

disorders.name: Indecision
disorders.survivor_effect: If you are the event revealer of hunt events that call on you to make a roll, roll twice and use the lower result.

disorders.name: Monster Panic
disorders.survivor_effect: Whenever you suffer brain damage from an Intimidate action, suffer 1 additional brain damage.

disorders.name: Post-Traumatic Stress
disorders.survivor_effect: Next settlement phase, you do not contribute or participate in any endeavors. Skip the next hunt to recover.

disorders.name: Prey
disorders.survivor_effect: You may not spend survival unless you are insane.

disorders.name: Quixotic
disorders.survivor_effect: If you are insane when you depart, gain +1 survival and +1 Strength token.

disorders.name: Rageholic
disorders.survivor_effect: Whenever you suffer a severe injury, also suffer the frenzy brain trauma.

disorders.name: Secretive
disorders.survivor_effect: When you are a returning survivor, you quickly become preoccuiped with your own affairs. You must skip the next hunt to deal with them.

disorders.name: Seizures
disorders.survivor_effect: During the showdown, whenever you suffer damage to your head location, you are knocked down.

disorders.name: Squeamish
disorders.survivor_effect: You cannot depart with any stinky gear in your gear grid. If a status or effect would cause you to become stinky, lose all your survival.

disorders.name: Traumatized
disorders.survivor_effect: Whenever you end your act adjacent to a monster, you are knocked down.

disorders.name: Vestiphobia
disorders.survivor_effect: You cannot wear armor at the body location. If you are wearing armor at the body location when you gain this disorder, archive it as you tear it off your person!

disorders.name: Weak Spot
disorders.survivor_effect: When you gain this disorder, roll a random hit location and record it. You cannot depart unless you have armor at this hit location.
